role_description: An Ansible role that installs Microsoft PowerToys (a set of helpful tools that Microsoft makes available for free) on Windows 10
role_description_full_overview: [Microsoft PowerToys](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/powertoys/) is a set of utilities for Windows power-users to tune and streamline their Windows 10 experience for greater productivity. It includes tools like a Color Picker, File Explorer add-ons, Keyboard Manager, Shortcut Guide, and more.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Microsoft PowerToys (a set of helpful tools that Microsoft makes available for free) on Windows 10.
